content_hint: Protagonist stumbles into the white room, door vanishing behind them
The sterile whiteness assaults the senses - metallic air, shadowless light
Awareness of complete silence except for own breathing and heartbeat
Two identical doors become visible on opposite walls
Frantic examination of walls, searching for hidden exits or mechanisms
Seamless surfaces yield no secrets, no escape routes
Understanding dawns that only the two doors offer passage
First glimpse of the permanent nature of this decision
Standing between the doors, feeling the weight of choice
